pr_title: SAMZA-2551: Upgrade all modules to automatically use checkstyle 6.11.2 (part 5: includes samza-yarn, samza-rest)

timeline.message: SAMZA-2551: Upgrade all modules to automatically use checkstyle 6.11.2 (part 3: includes samza-yarn, samza-rest)

timeline.bodyText:
maybe we can link it to the class that is used just like before?
{@link org.apache.samza.rest.proxy.task.TaskResourceConfig}
timeline.author: abhishekshivanna

timeline.bodyText:
This is mostly for my own understanding - don't we already have an "unused imports" check during build?
Or was the check somehow not being applied to these files?
timeline.author: abhishekshivanna

replies.bodyText: Our checkstyle does have an unused imports check, but these files never had checkstyle enabled.
replies.author: cameronlee314
